name: universal-js-boilerplate
description: This is a Node/Browserify/Babel/Backbone/React/etc boilerplate. To be used as an initial scaffolding tool.
author: Matthew Keas <matthiasak@gmail.com>

scripts.postinstall: npm run copy_files && npm run msg;
scripts.msg:
# ---------------------------------
# 
# 
# Do either 1 or 2, not both:
# 
# 1. If you have your global tools already installed from a prior project with this boilerplate (babel, postcss, etc): _npm run linkup_.
# 2. If you don't yet run this, run it once and don't run it again: _npm run setup_.
# 
# 
# ---------------------------------
#
#
#---- finally start your server with _npm run s_ :-) "
